title: (x) St. Mark's Book shop - (similar to) IBM Bodoni {Chesh}
content: It could be an older display version of Bodoni. It looks more like Bodoni than Didot to me, anyway.
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: I agree with Mark. Check out [IBM Bodoni](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516141214/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/ibm-bodoni/ibm-bodoni/testdrive.html?s=St.%2BMarks&p=96).
I was concerned about those two things as well, but since the sample is so rough, it's possible that the k connection and the t curve simply filled in in the sample. Hope springs eternal.
